mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(max(board_code),-1) as board_code FROM board where user_id =#{user_id} and board_type_code between (1 and 3) and (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{latitude}))*cos(radians(log_latitude))*cos(radians(log_longtitude) -radians(#{longitude}))+sin(radians(#{latitude}))*sin(radians(log_latitude)))) <= 0.55 ORDER BY board_date LIMIT 0,1
